$search=foo
$search=foo bar
$search=foo bar baz
$search=foo AND bar
$search=foo AND bar AND baz
$search=foo OR bar
$search=foo OR bar OR baz
$search=NOT foo
$search=foo NOT bar
$search=foo NOT bar NOT baz
$search=foo NOT bar baz
$search=foo baz NOT bar
$search="foo bar"
$search="foo bar baz"
$search=
$search=(foo OR bar) AND NOT "baz zooka"
$search=(foo OR bar) AND NOT "baz\"zooka\""
